name: Metal Music For Posers : B Quiz / Test | Heavy Metal | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the closing song on Tourniquet's 1991 effort 'Psychosurgery'?
questions.explanation:
'Officium Defunctorium'.

	Tourniquet is on Intense Records. I highly recommend checking them out if you've never heard them.

questions.text: Finish the line: 'Got his masters degree from Harvard College..'
questions.correct: built his house from his architect knowledge
questions.explanation:
built his house from his architect knowledge.

	This is from 'Three Pigs' by Green Jelly. Good song.

questions.text: In what year did the Deftones debut 'Adrenaline' come out?
questions.explanation:
1995.

	Personally, I thought this one was their best.

questions.text: What album is the Primus song 'Sinister Exaggerator' on?
questions.explanation:
'Miscellaneous Debris'.

	'Miscellaneous Debris' was an album constituted of B-sides and sondtrack songs like Megadeth's 'Hidden Treasures'.

questions.text: What song on 'Mer De Noms' did Maynard James Keenan write for his fiance?
'Grisly sacrificial slaughter..' what Fear Factory song is this from?
questions.explanation:
'Where Evil Dwells'.

	This song is on the limited edition 'Obsolete' digipack.

questions.text: Death broke up(so to speak) and a new band formed in its place. What is the name of this band?
questions.explanation:
Control Denied.

	Black Star was formed after Carcass broke up while Six Feet Under and Disincarnate were side projects.

'The Day the World Went Away'.
